data.event: Incorporated in 1924, the population at the 2010 census was 5,209.

event.title: established a one-room school called Sunnyside in 1848

data.event: This small group of farm families established a one-room school called Sunnyside in 1848.
Now housed in a larger and newer building, Sunnyside Elementary School still operates today.
Now housed in a larger and newer building, Sunnyside Elementary School still operates today.
A short distance west on St. Charles Road (which was completed in 1836), farmland was donated for what is now known as Old Settler's Cemetery.
